name: Keep Turning!
description:
Keep Turning! is an engaging platforming game you only need one finger to play.

Roll your cube down a stylish maze by tapping to turn and jump. Enhance your experience by turning the volume up & feel the awesome rhythm! It really helps!

Collect gems for some fancy cosmetic upgrades to your heroic cube. Compete against your friends by comparing high-scores.

How far can you get?
